channel.title: PostgreSQL on Happiness Development
channel.description: Recent content in PostgreSQL on Happiness Development

item.title: PostgreSQL
item.description: PostgreSQL Install on Mac https://formulae.brew.sh/formula/postgresql $ brew install postgresql Server start $ pg_ctl -D /usr/local/var/postgres start Server stop $ pg_ctl -D /usr/local/var/postgres stop status check $ export PGDATA='/usr/local/var/postgres' $ pg_ctl status
